ComicInfo.Title: The Vision of the Sixth Heaven; Star Eyed Stella Drops Into Rotting Zombiesville; Like Krazy, Man; My Secret Date With Linda Blair; Ruby the Dyke Enters Rotting Zombiesville; Blobman Comics No. 10; Bar Talk Among...; In the Begining... the Juggler; Henri & Blobby; The Checkered Demon Visits Rotting Zombiesville; Blobman Comics No. 11; Blobman Comics No. 12; The Churl; (Self) Important Comics; I've Had It!; Incident at Zwigoff's; My Big Break
ComicInfo.Summary:
Crumb's version of the disagreement between him and some of the other Zap regulars.
The artists give their version of the disagreement with Crumb.
Mavrides gives his point of view on the disagreement some of the other artists have with Crumb.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-10 22:21:20. [Issue ID 202447]
